text: Suspicion is a 1941 romantic thriller movie. It is based on the novel Before the Fact. The movie was directed by Alfred Hitchcock. Cary Grant plays Johnnie, a gambler. Joan Fontaine plays Lina. Dame May Whitty plays Martha. This movie was nominated for Academy Awards for the Best Picture and the Best Original Score. Fontaine won the Best Actress award. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1940s psychological movies Category:1941 mystery movies Category:1940s thriller movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American romantic thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock Category:Movies set in England
title: Suspicion (1941 movie)
